Body: I have a tablet of unknown origin, That was stuck with Black screen. I found some hints on how to reboot by pressing the volume- button and powerbutton. Now the tablet is stuck with This screen: "recovery confirmed-boot into system recovery mode"? What can i do to proceed? If nescecary i can disconnect the battery, soldering the wires off and on again? Hope to have some ideas from you
Title: tablet stuck on recovery screen
